hero.title: Driving Innovation and Scientific Excellence in Harar
hero.description: Harar Innovation & Science fosters research, innovation, and technological development. Explore programs, events, and resources designed to empower our community and advance knowledge for a brighter future.

about.missionDescription: Harar Innovation & Technology Agency is dedicated to fostering research, innovation, and scientific development in the region. We support local talent, promote knowledge-sharing, and create opportunities that drive sustainable growth and technological advancement for the Harar community.

home.title: Stay Updated with Our Events
home.description: Check out the latest opportunities, summits, and workshops happening in Harar and online.

page.description: Explore all scheduled events and opportunities to connect, learn, and innovate.

innovationSummit.title: Innovation Summit 2025
innovationSummit.description: Join leading innovators and entrepreneurs for talks, networking, and workshops.

startupPitch.title: Startup Pitch Night
startupPitch.description: Pitch your startup to investors and get valuable feedback and funding opportunities.

techBootcamp.title: Tech Bootcamp
techBootcamp.description: Learn latest tech skills from expert instructors in an immersive week-long bootcamp.

story1.text: Thanks to Harar Innovation & Science, our startup secured funding and grew from 2 to 20 employees in just one year!
story1.author: Alemayehu, Founder of TechForGood

story2.text: The mentorship and events opened doors I never imagined. I now lead a project impacting hundreds of local students.
story2.author: Mulu, Software Engineer & Entrepreneur

story3.text: Through their bootcamps, I gained skills that landed me my dream job in software engineering.
story3.author: Sara, Full-Stack Developer

page.title: Innovation News
page.description: Stay updated with the latest opportunities and programs.
page.noNews: No news available at the moment.

callToAction.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
callToAction.description: Join Harar Innovation & Science today and be part of Ethiopia’s technology and innovation revolution.

footer.mission: Empowering innovation, technology, and entrepreneurship across Ethiopia.

hero.title: About Harar Innovation & Tecnolgy Agency
hero.description: Harar Innovation & Tecnlogy Agency is a government-led platform dedicated to accelerating digital transformation, empowering local talent, and creating sustainable economic opportunities through technology and entrepreneurship.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To unlock Ethiopia's innovation potential by nurturing tech-driven startups, fostering creative ecosystems, and enabling inclusive access to digital resources and opportunities across all regions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision an Ethiopia where innovation is inclusive, technology is accessible, and every citizen — from urban entrepreneurs to rural youth — can contribute to and benefit from a digital future.

whatWeDo.heading: What We Do
whatWeDo.startups: Incubate and accelerate early-stage startups with funding, mentorship, and workspaces.
whatWeDo.bootcamps: Host nationwide tech bootcamps, hackathons, and innovation challenges.
whatWeDo.partnerships: Facilitate partnerships between government, universities, and the private sector.
whatWeDo.stem: Promote STEM education and digital skills training in schools and communities.
whatWeDo.policy: Drive policy and advocacy to support Ethiopia’s digital economy.

coreValues.heading: Our Core Values
coreValues.inclusivityDesc: We ensure equal access to innovation support regardless of gender, age, background, or geography.
coreValues.integrityDesc: We operate with full transparency, accountability, and ethical responsibility in all engagements.
coreValues.collaborationDesc: We build bridges between government, academia, industry, and communities to scale innovation impact.

cta.heading: Join Ethiopia’s Innovation Movement
cta.description: Whether you are an innovator, partner, educator, or policymaker — Harar Innovation & Science invites you to be part of our mission to empower the future of technology in Ethiopia.
